  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15343</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Rat-Rat-Rat- Wer soll da noch durchblicken?</string>
            <string language="en">Council-council-council - who still should look through there?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conseil-conseil-conseil - qui devrait encore 
regarder à travers là ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conselho-conselho-conselho - quem ainda deve olhar
completamente lá?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consiglio-consiglio-consiglio - chi ancora 
dovrebbe osservare attraverso là?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το συμβούλιο-συμβούλιο - ποιος θα έπρεπε ακόμα να 
κοιτάξει μέσω εκεί;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Consejo-consejo-consejo - quién todavía debe 
mirar a través allí?</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Mit der Bezeichnng "Rat" geht man in der EU großzügig um. Das führt zur Verwirrung. Ein Lückentext soll den Umgang mit den korrekten Bezeichnungen üben.</string>
            <string language="en">"Council" is generously used in the EU. This leads to some confusions. A gap-text should practice the contact with the correct names.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le "Conseil" est généreusement utilisé dans l'EU. 
Ceci mène à quelques confusions. Un intervalle-texte 
devrait pratiquer le contact avec les noms corrects.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o "conselho" é usado generosa no EU. Isto conduz a 
alguns confusions. Um abertura-texto deve praticar o contato com
os nomes corretos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il Consiglio" è usato generoso nell'UE. 
Ciò conduce ad alcuni confusions. Un spacco-testo 
dovrebbe esercitarsi nel contatto con i nomi corretti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Το Συμβούλιο" χρησιμοποιείται γενναιόδωρα στην ΕΕ. 
Αυτό οδηγεί σε μερικά confusions. Ένα 
χάσμα-κείμενο πρέπει να ασκήσει την επαφή με τα σωστά ονόματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">utilizan al "consejo" abundante en el EU. Esto 
conduce a algunos confusions. Un boquete-texto debe practicar el
contacto con los nombres correctos.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          <description>
            <string language="de">Die häufige Verwendung des Begriffs "Rat" verwirrt gelegentlich etwas. Die Schüler können sich die Bedeutung der unterschiedlichen Gremien erarbeiten oder ihr Wissen testen.</string>
            <string language="en">The frequent application of the term "Advice" confuses something occasionally. The students can work hard for the meaning of the different committees or can test her/its/their knowledge.
</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
